text: She broke out on the scene as a Fly Girl for Nineties variety show In Living Color. And now Jennifer Lopez is going back to her dancing roots in a very different way. The 47 - year - old actress copied children's dance moves alongside James Corden in a hilarious segment titled Toddlerography which aired on Monday night.
